translation.en: It's that special time of year, the holidays, where we gather together with the people we love
translation.es: Navidad, esa época especial del año en que nos reunimos con familiares

translation.en: and eat so much food.
This is making me so hungry. Maybe there's something else on.
translation.es: Esto me está dando hambre. ¿Miramos otra cosa?

translation.en: Yeah.
It isn't a real holiday if you don't have tasty, delicious food.
translation.es: No es una verdadera fiesta si no hay comida deliciosa.

translation.en: Look at-- …all-- …this-- …tasty-- …food.
But, Moch, our ice is all we've got while the store's on holiday vacation.
translation.es: Moch, hasta que abra la tienda, solo tenemos es hielo.

translation.en: - Who could that be? - I don't know.
- - Hi, Steve.
Happy holidays, Waffles and Mochi!
Check it out!
I'm cooking up a batch of Steve's famous latkes over here for Hanukkah.
translation.es: Estoy cocinando los famosos latkes de Steve para Janucá.

translation.en: How's your holiday going?
Uh, our holiday?
- We don't have a holiday. -
What's your holiday called?
- Hm… - Oh, our holiday?
Uh, it's called Free…
Freezie Day?
- Yeah. Huh? - Freezie Day!
I bet you two stellar chefs are cooking up a huge Freezie Day feast!
translation.es: ¡Apuesto a que están preparando un gran banquete para el Día Frío!

translation.en: Well, where do I even start? Hm…
There's so much food. Too much, actually.
I wish you could come over and eat all this food.
Really? You mean that? This is so exciting!
Uh, Steve?
Who could that be?
Happy Freezie Day!
Now, where's all the tasty food?
- How on earth did you even-- - Oh, you must be Waffles and Mochi!
translation.es: - Pero ¿cómo…? - Deben ser Waffles y Mochi.

translation.en: - Huh? - I'm Broomhilda, Steve's partner.
He has told me all about the food that you have prepared for…
translation.es: Steve me contó sobre toda la comida que prepararon para…

translation.en: Oh, what's it called?
Freezie Day!
Don't worry, Steve Jr., the food will be out soon.
- Mochi, can I talk to you? - Uh- huh.
Mochi, we don't have any food.
Freezie Day isn't a real holiday without food. What do we do, Moch?
translation.es: Sin comida, el Día Frío no será una fiesta. ¿Qué hacemos?

translation.en: Yeah. You're right, Mochi.
If we give our guests a great big holiday feast,
translation.es: Si preparamos un gran banquete festivo,

translation.en: maybe we can make Freezie Day a real holiday!
translation.es: el Día Frío podría volverse una fiesta.

translation.en: Let's make this dinner happen.
Take the Magicart and bring back holiday foods. - I'll keep them distracted. -
translation.es: Ve a traer comida con el Magicarro. Yo los distraeré.

translation.en: But remember, you gotta be back before the sun goes down.
translation.es: Recuerda, debes regresar antes del atardecer.

translation.en: It's a holiday, not a holi- night.
translation.es: El festejo debe ser de día.

translation.en: Let's go in three, two…
- - …blast off!
I've heard of a ton of holidays that happen around this time of year
translation.es: Hay muchas fiestas para el solsticio de invierno,

translation.en: for winter solstice, but never Freezie Day!
translation.es: Hay muchas fiestas para el solsticio de invierno, pero no conocía el Día Frío.

translation.en: What's winter solstice?
translation.es: El solsticio de invierno es el día más corto

translation.en: It's the shortest day and the longest night of the year.
translation.es: El solsticio de invierno es el día más corto y la noche más larga del año.

translation.en: Let me explain.
translation.es: y la noche más larga del año.

translation.en: See the position of the Earth, how it's tilted while it orbits the sun?
translation.es: La inclinación de la Tierra al orbitar el sol

translation.en: That's what gives us seasons!
So every year around December 21st,
the position of the Earth means half of our planet experiences winter,
translation.es: en una mitad del planeta, es invierno

translation.en: making it the shortest daytime of the year!
translation.es: y el día más corto del año.

translation.en: But here's the coolest part.
When it's the shortest day of the year here, it's the longest day of the year here,
translation.es: cuando aquí es el día más corto del año, aquí es el más largo.

translation.en: AKA it's summer.
That's right. Down Under, Christmas is a summer holiday.
translation.es: En Australia, la Navidad se festeja en verano.

translation.en: So right now, it's summer and winter at the same time!
translation.es: Así que ahora es verano e invierno ¡al mismo tiempo!

translation.en: - - For thousands of years,
civilizations around the world have celebrated winter solstice
because the sun and seasons are so important to our food and lives.
translation.es: porque el sol y las estaciones son muy importantes.

translation.en: - - Right! Our mission.
You need to bring back food for a Freezie Day Feast before sundown,
translation.es: Debes llevar comida antes del atardecer,

translation.en: and I know just the winter holiday for you.
translation.es: y ya sé a qué fiesta debemos ir.

translation.en: Makahiki.
Yep, this is winter in Hawaii.
translation.es: Sí, esto es invierno en Hawái.

translation.en: Makahiki is an indigenous Hawaiian holiday feast that lasts…
translation.es: Makahiki es un festival hawaiano que dura…

translation.en: wait for it…
four months!
I know just the person for you to meet.
translation.es: Ya sé a quién deberías conocer.

translation.en: My chef friend, Kimi Swimmy, knows all about Makahiki.
translation.es: La chef Kimi Swimmy sabe todo sobre Makahiki.

translation.en: - Aloha Hawaii! -
Okay, Mochi, aim for Kimi's boogie board!
translation.es: Mochi, ¡apunta a la tabla de Kimi!

translation.en: - Who are you? - My name's Mochi!
Hi, Mochi!
Oh, we're gonna go celebrate Makahiki today. I'm getting fish for it.
translation.es: Hoy celebraremos Makahiki. Voy a pescar la cena.

translation.en: There's a bunch of fish down there. We call them u'u,
translation.es: Hay muchos peces aquí. Los llamamos U'u.

translation.en: and they live in these dark caves at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.es: Viven en estas cuevas oscuras en el fondo del océano.

translation.en: And I have to hold my breath and go down,
translation.es: Debo aguantar la respiración y descender,

translation.en: and then that's when I'm able to take my spear and catch 'em.
translation.es: y luego tomar mi lanza y atraparlos.

translation.en: We always want these fish to be reproducing and growing
translation.es: Queremos que estos peces se reproduzcan y crezcan, y mantengan al océano saludable.

translation.en: and keeping our oceans healthy.
- I'm only taking what I need. - Wow!
We're gonna go fry these up for our Makahiki feast. Wanna come?
translation.es: Los freiré para el banquete de Makahiki. ¿Vienes?

translation.en: A little higher.
- - A little lower.
A little higher.
A little lower.
- - Come in!
Happy Freezie Day!
We're hungry for fun!
I hope it's okay. I invited our friends from the store.
translation.es: Invité a algunos amigos de la tienda.

translation.en: And we invited world- renowned chef Samin Nosrat.
translation.es: Y yo a la famosa chef, Samin Nosrat.

translation.en: - What? - Happy Freezie Day!
It's okay. I'm good.
Mochi, get home soon.
Welcome to my backyard.
- Mochi, you gonna help me cook some fish? - Yeah!
So, a lot of times, people eat fish as fish fillets,
translation.es: La mayoría de la gente come filetes de pescado,

translation.en: where they're just in these rectangles and they don't have any skins or bones,
translation.es: esos rectángulos que no tienen piel ni espinas.

translation.en: but we cook them whole. So you're always gonna remember that it's a fish.
translation.es: Nosotros los cocinamos enteros, así recordamos que son peces.

translation.en: Mochi, while I finish up, why don't you help the kids make some poi?
translation.es: Mochi, ¿quieres ayudar a los niños a hacer poi?

translation.en: Poi is mashed kalo that you pound with this kind of rock.
translation.es: Poi es un puré de kalo, que se machaca con este tipo de roca.

translation.en: Come eat, everybody.
Oh, wow! Everybody's hungry!
So Makahiki is all about a change of season.
translation.es: Makahiki se trata del cambio de estación.

translation.en: We celebrate the land's abundance to feed us.
translation.es: Celebramos la abundancia de la tierra para alimentarnos.

translation.en: Hawaiians like to eat.
Who doesn't like to eat?
There's just something really special about eating close to home
translation.es: Hay algo muy especial sobre comer cerca de casa

translation.en: and only taking what you need
translation.es: y tomar solo lo que necesitas.

translation.en: because that's how you take care of your home.
translation.es: Así es como se cuida el hogar.

translation.en: There's a bite of fish if you want.
- - What do you think?
That's really what we're celebrating when we celebrate Makahiki.
translation.es: Esto es lo que celebramos en Makahiki.

translation.en: Food and the land and the community.
translation.es: La comida, la tierra y la comunidad.

translation.en: And that's worth celebrating, don't you think?
That's right, Mochi.
If you take care of the food, the food will take care of you.
translation.es: Si la cuidas, la comida te cuidará a ti.

translation.en: Hey, Mochi, wanna play a game?
- Go, Mochi! -
Here you go, Mochi. Now you're part of the ohana.
translation.es: Toma. Ahora formas parte de nuestra Ohana.

translation.en: That means family.
Ah no, who could that be?
Happy Freezie Day!
Busy, you're here too?
Well, I'm famished, but where's all the food?
translation.es: Estoy famélico, ¿dónde está toda la comida?

translation.en: Hello, Steve. Hello, Samin.
So, Waffles, tell me all about your menu inspiration.
translation.es: ¿En qué te inspiraste para hacer el menú?

translation.en: I wanna know everything about this party.
- Uh… - You must have been cooking for days!
Hey, everyone! Look what I found!
It's a snow cone maker!
No, Steve, don't flip the switch!
Flipping the switch!
- - That's our snowblower.
Guys, I just need to turn this thing off quick.
- I'm okay. -
Hello!
It's Tracee Ellis Ross!
- Hi, everyone! Hi! - Hi, Tracee!
Shelfie invited me. We're in yoga class together. Did I miss Freezie Day?
translation.es: Ana-quel me invitó. Vamos juntas a yoga. ¿Me perdí el Día Frío?

translation.en: Your timing, like your talent, is impeccable, Tracee. We're just about to eat snow cones.
translation.es: Eres tan oportuna como talentosa. Íbamos a comer granizados.

translation.en: Ooh, well, I can't say no cone to a snow cone.
translation.es: No puedo negarme a un granizado.

translation.en: Help! Mochi!
- - Mochi, say aloha. We gotta jet!
Take as much poi as you need and anything else you want.
translation.es: Toma todo el poi y la comida que quieras.

translation.en: Aloha, Mochi!
I hope that's Mochi and the food.
- Baker! - Hey!
Happy Freezie Day!
Happy Freezie Day!
Hey, guess what I brought?
Oh yes! Is that what I think it is?
Our friends the Pupcakes, of course!
Oh, the Pupcakes.
Yay, even more mouths to feed. Cool.
I knew you would be so happy.
I think I better call Mochi.
Moch, where's the food?
- Fresh Hawaiian poi? - Yeah.
Well, that sounds like an amazing holiday food, but we have way more guests than we thought.
translation.es: Suena increíble, pero llegaron muchos más invitados.

translation.en: We're gonna need even more food for our Freezie Day dinner.
translation.es: Necesitaremos más comida para la cena.

translation.en: Well, since it's the winter solstice, we could go to Sweden for Saint Lucy's Day,
translation.es: Podríamos ir a Suecia, para el Día de Santa Lucía,

translation.en: or we could go to Guatemala for Fiesta de Santo Tomás,
translation.es: o a la Fiesta de Santo Tomás, en Guatemala,

translation.en: or China for Dongzhi, or…
translation.es: o al Dongji, en China, o…

translation.en: Wait! I know where we should go to top off your Freezie Day feast.
Norway!
The Sámi people there celebrate Juovllat,
a cozy holiday when families gather to sing and eat special foods they've saved all winter.
translation.es: una fiesta en la que se reúnen a cantar y comer platos especiales.

translation.en: Let's go see my friend Maret in Norway. She's a reindeer herder.
translation.es: Visitaremos a Maret en Noruega. Es pastora de renos.

translation.en: She can hook you up with food for your Freezie Day dinner.
translation.es: Ella conseguirá comida para tu cena.

translation.en: Well, just get back with lots of food, okay? Before sundown.
translation.es: Regresa con mucha comida, antes del atardecer.

translation.en: - Hurry, Moch! -
To Norway, Mochi! Hallo!
Landing in Norway!
Brace for impact!
My name is Mochi!
Bye- bye!
Sorry about that.
That was my reindeer, Missy.
Today is the Juovllat.
Juovllat?
You have to celebrate the Juovllat with us.
Do you know how to drive the snowmobile?
Let's go to get something to eat.
translation.es: Vamos a buscar algo para comer.

translation.en: Do you like pancakes?
For our holiday, Juovllat, we make Sami pancakes.
translation.es: Para nuestra fiesta, Juovllat, hacemos panqueques sami.

translation.en: - Okta. - One.
- Guokte. - Two.
- Golbma. - Three.
- Njeallje. - Four.
- Vihtta. - Five.
- Get some sugar. -
- And some milk too. -
- Wheat flour. -
- You have some reindeer blood. - Oh!
translation.es: Un poco de sangre de reno.

translation.en: Sámi people eat reindeer because reindeer eat lichen under the snow
translation.es: Los Samis comen renos porque los renos comen líquenes,

translation.en: which gives us vitamins we can't get in winter without them.
translation.es: y eso nos da vitaminas que no podemos obtener en invierno.

translation.en: We take care of reindeer, and they take care of us.
translation.es: Nosotros cuidamos a los renos y ellos nos cuidan a nosotros.

translation.en: Come on, Moch. Where are you?
Hey, Waffles, come listen to Samin.
translation.es: Waffles, ven a escuchar a Samin.

translation.en: In Iran, we have a holiday called Yalda.
translation.es: En Irán, hay una fiesta llamada Yalda.

translation.en: It's a winter celebration that dates back 2500 years.
translation.es: Es una fiesta de invierno desde hace 2500 años.

translation.en: Let me show you. These are some of my favorite foods we eat.
- There's watermelon. - Look delicious.
And pomegranates.\
All night long, Waffles,
translation.es: Lo único que hacemos toda la noche es comer.

translation.en: all we do is eat and eat and eat.
translation.es: Lo único que hacemos toda la noche es comer. Genial.

translation.en: - Just like we're gonna do here tonight. - Yes!
Freezie Day will never be real without some food.
translation.es: El Día Frío no existirá sin comida.

translation.en: If you'll excuse me.
- So cool. -
- - Mochi, are you on your way?
What? You are still in Norway?
- - You're still in Norway?
Oh, Mrs. O's calling. She'll know what to do.
translation.es: Es la Señora O. Ella me ayudará.

translation.en: Happy Freezie Day, Waffles!
- What? How did you know? - Shelfie told me all about it.
How's the dinner?
Great. Except for the food.
Look, can I tell you something, Waffles?
Our Christmas turkey didn't go as planned either.
translation.es: Nuestro pavo de Navidad tampoco salió muy bien.

translation.en: I burned it.
- You did? - Yeah, but that's okay. We're having fun together.
translation.es: - ¿Sí? - Pero no importa, nos vamos a divertir.

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - Oh, is that Mrs. O?
- Happy Freezie Day! Mrs. O, everybody! - Hi, Mrs. O!
translation.es: - ¡Feliz Día Frío, Señora O! - ¡Hola, Señora O!

translation.en: You guys singing any good Freezie Day songs?
There are so many.
translation.es: ¿Están cantando canciones del Día Frío? Hay muchas. Me gustaría, pero no tenemos piano.

translation.en: I'd love to sing, but we don't have a piano.
translation.es: Hay muchas. Me gustaría, pero no tenemos piano.

translation.en: Oh, I do.
You have a piano?
Of course she does. She's Tracee Ellis Ross!
translation.es: Claro que sí. ¡Es Tracee Ellis Ross!

translation.en: A true artiste.
You're putting a lot of pressure on me, Busy.
Teach us a Freezie Day song, won't you, Waffles?
translation.es: Enséñanos alguna canción del Día Frío.

translation.en: - Yes, Waffles. - Uh… Ooh…
Go, Waffles, go! Teach us a good song.
- - Here goes nothing.
- Today's the day we celebrate - Oh…
translation.es: Hoy es un día para celebrar.

translation.en: There's dinner plates It's Freezie Day
translation.es: Y comida preparar. El Día Frío hay que festejar.

translation.en: - I love it! - Me too.
And we will eat
A feast?
- Yeah, we'll eat a traditional feast. - So sweet!
- It's Freezie Day - Freezie Day
translation.es: - Es el Día Frío. - Día Frío.

translation.en: Oh! I love it!
- Yeah. - So good.
Mochi, I'm counting on you, bud.
Our traditional place to cook is the lavvu.
translation.es: El Lavvu es el lugar donde cocinamos.

translation.en: - I'm making blood pancakes on the fire. - Oh…
translation.es: Ahora cocinaré los panqueques de sangre.

translation.en: And then we add the cloudberry jam.
translation.es: Luego agregamos jalea de moras de pantano.

translation.en: Cloudberries are a golden berry we love to pick in the summertime.
translation.es: Las moras de pantano son bayas que recogemos en verano.

translation.en: - We have made a gift for you. -
Mochi! We gotta get back to Waffles and Freezie Day!
translation.es: ¡Debemos regresar a celebrar el Día Frío!

translation.en: Wait! Before you go, I have made some of my cloudberry jam for you.
translation.es: ¡Espera! Te preparé mi jalea de moras de pantano.

translation.en: Bye- bye!
Let's let Waffles know the good news!
Wow, Moch, you got cloudberry jam in Norway?
- - Yay, you saved our holiday!
When will you be home? The sun is gonna set any minute now.
We need to serve Freezie Day dinner before the sun goes down.
translation.es: Y debemos servir la cena antes.

translation.en: We're on our way, Waffles!
Nothing can stop us now.
Just gotta get through this tiny blizzard up ahead, and then we're cool.
translation.es: Solo debemos atravesar esta tormenta de nieve.

translation.en: - - Did you say tiny blizzard?
Yeah, but it's nothing ol' Magicart can't handle!
Look out!
Look out!
Mochi, Magicart, are you there?
- Look out! -
Oh no. No, no, no. The sun.
Oh no.
Oh no, Mochi, the sun went down!
translation.es: No, Mochi, ya se puso el sol.

translation.en: We failed!
You doing okay?
Of course. Don't I look like I'm okay?
translation.es: Por supuesto. ¿No parece que estoy bien?

translation.en: To be honest, no, not really.
translation.es: Para ser honesta, no, en realidad no.

translation.en: Baker,
can I tell you something?
Yeah, always.
Freezie Day isn't real. Mochi and I made it up.
translation.es: El Día Frío no existe. Mochi y yo lo inventamos.

translation.en: The truth is we have no holiday, no food,
and now Mochi and Magicart are caught in a blizzard.
translation.es: y Mochi está atrapado en una tormenta.

translation.en: Come here.
- - Come here.
I know. Come here.
- It's time you told everyone the truth. -
translation.es: Es hora de contarles la verdad.

translation.en: We did it!
We did make it! We survived!
What in the…
Something's coming up beside us.
And then you, Samin, you were so excited.
translation.es: Y tú, Samin, estabas tan emocionada.

translation.en: Then the Pupcakes came and they were all over the place.
And one thing led to another and…
translation.es: Y una cosa llevó a la otra…

translation.en: There is no Freezie Day!
What?
Wait, so am I not really here?
Is this a dream? Am I in a simulation?
Mochi!
Oh, Mochi, so glad you're back safe.
translation.es: Me alegra que estés a salvo.

translation.en: But the jig is up. They know Freezie Day isn't real.
translation.es: Ya saben que el Día Frío no existe.

translation.en: Sorry.
So the holidays aren't just about food.
translation.es: Las fiestas no se tratan solo de comida.

translation.en: - Exactly. - Yeah.
They're about, you know, being with family and friends.
translation.es: Se trata de estar con la familia y los amigos.

translation.en: And singing songs and playing games.
And more than that, they're about the universal traditions that have been bringing humans together since the dawn of time.
translation.es: Son tradiciones universales que han unido a los humanos desde siempre.

translation.en: But also, there's food, right?
Well, the sun went down though.
You know, not to bring up my super cool holiday again,
translation.es: No es por volver a mencionar mis geniales fiestas,

translation.en: but Yalda actually starts after the sun goes down.
translation.es: pero Yalda comienza después del atardecer.

translation.en: - - And it goes all night long.
All night long?
Moch, do you know what this means?
Freezie Day can still happen!
Hit it, Tracee.
- Today's the day - Oh.
We celebrate with all our friends And eat real late
translation.es: que celebramos y comemos hasta que se haga de día.

translation.en: It's Freezie Day
And we will cook a traditional feast
We'll whisk and chop And use other techniques!
It's Freezie Day
Mochi, look! Freezie Day is real.
translation.es: ¡Mochi, mira! El Día Frío es real.

translation.en: We made our own holiday tradition.
We're singing, we're cooking,
and we're up way past our bedtime.
translation.es: y nos iremos a dormir muy tarde.

translation.en: Who wants snow cones?  Me!
A special time to be together
You can feel the magic in the air
translation.es: Puedes sentir la magia en el aire.

translation.en: See the smiles around the table
translation.es: Ver las sonrisas alrededor de la mesa.

translation.en: A time to give and a time to share
translation.es: Un momento para dar y recibir.

translation.en: There's traditions we observe
Like sweet jam we preserved
And there's my favorite treat That I love to serve
translation.es: Como mi dulce favorito que me encanta servir.

translation.en: A berry- topped snow cone
And that's where we'll begin
Yeah, everything tastes better When you're with your friends
translation.es: Sí, todo sabe mejor cuando estás con tus amigos.

translation.en: Today's the day
We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates
translation.es: Celebramos con el corazón lleno de alegría.

translation.en: It's Freezie Day
We sing and laugh
There's lots to eat
We'll have leftovers for weeks
It's Freezie Day
Today's the day
We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates
translation.es: Celebramos con el corazón lleno de alegría.

translation.en: It's Freezie Day
We sing and laugh
There's lots to eat We'll have leftovers for weeks
translation.es: Hay mucha comida, sobrará para muchos días.

translation.en: It's Freezie Day
Today's the day
We celebrate With hearts as full as dinner plates
translation.es: Celebramos con el corazón lleno de alegría.

translation.en: It's Freezie Day
We sing and laugh
There's lots to eat We'll have leftovers for weeks
translation.es: Hay mucha comida, sobrará para muchos días.

translation.en: - It's Freezie Day - Oh, it's Freezie Day
translation.es: - Es el Día Frío. - Es el Día Frío.

translation.en: I hope they ask us to clean up!
Freezie Day
Until next Freezie Day, everyone!
See you next year!
Freezie Day
